src:
Jadwal Pekan ke-11 Serie A: Derbi Turin dan AC Milan vs Lazio
01 Nov 2019, 14:51 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Jadwal pekan ke-11 Serie A. Pada pekan ke-11 Serie A ini, bakal ada laga-laga seru terjadi. Salah satunya adalah derbi Turin yang mempertemukan dua tim sekota, Torino melawan Juventus.
Torino menjadi tuan rumah Derbi Turin. Laga digelar di Stadion Olimpico Grande Torino. Meskipun menjadi tuan rumah, Torino tidak diunggulkan. Sebab, Torino tidak pernah menang dalam lima laga terakhir.
Sedangkan, kubu Juventus kini dalam performa terbaik. Juventus belum tersentuh kekalahan. Juventus juga memiliki Cristiano Ronaldo yang belum berhenti mencetak gol. Pemain berusia 34 tahun mencetak satu gol saat Juventus menang 2-1 atas Genoa.
Hanya saja, kinerja lini depan Si Nyonya Tua kini cukup meragukan. Juventus tidak pernah mencetak lebih dari dua gol dalam lima laga terakhir. Pelatih Maurizio Sarri sempat mengeluhkan ketajaman timnya.
text:
Serie A Week 11 fixtures: Turin derby and AC Milan v Lazio
Nov 01 2019, 14:51 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Schedule 11 of Serie A. Week 11 of Serie A, there will be exciting matches going on. One of them is the Turin derby which brought together two city teams, Torino against Juventus.
Torino hosts the Turin Derbi. The match was held at the Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino. Despite being a host, Torino is not seeded. Because, Torino has never won in the last five matches.
Meanwhile, the stronghold of Juventus is now in the best performance. Juventus have not been touched by defeat. Juventus also have Cristiano Ronaldo who hasn't stopped scoring goals. The 34-year-old scored one goal in Juventus's 2-1 win over Genoa.
It's just that the performance of the front line of the Old Lady is now quite dubious. Juventus have never scored more than two goals in the last five matches. Coach Maurizio Sarri had complained about the sharpness of his team.
